Package org.pipservices4.messaging.build

Class MessageQueueFactory

java.lang.Object
org.pipservices4.components.build.Factory
org.pipservices4.messaging.build.MessageQueueFactory
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.pipservices4.components.build.IFactory, org.pipservices4.components.config.IConfigurable, org.pipservices4.components.refer.IReferenceable, IMessageQueueFactory
Direct Known Subclasses:
MemoryMessageQueueFactory
public abstract class MessageQueueFactory extends org.pipservices4.components.build.Factory implements IMessageQueueFactory, org.pipservices4.components.config.IConfigurable, org.pipservices4.components.refer.IReferenceable
Creates IMessageQueue components by their descriptors. Name of created message queue is taken from its descriptor.
